entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Rain beginning overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers beginning in the evening then changing to flurries after midnight. Fog patches developing in the evening and dissipating overnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023
